edu.ncsu.csc316.ancestrytree.manager

Class AncestryTreeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.ancestrytree.manager.AncestryTreeManager

  • public class AncestryTreeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The AncestryTreeManager class has all of the required functions and variables to generate an AncestryTree from the given file
    Author:
    Pranesh Kamalakanthan

    • Method Detail

      • buildTree

        public TreeNode buildTree(TreeNode root,
                 ArrayList<TreeNode> preOrder,
                 int preMin,
                 int preMax,
                 ArrayList<TreeNode> postOrder,
                 int postMin,
                 int postMax)
        Builds a TraversalTree and returns the root Node
        Parameters:
        root - the current root node
        preOrder - the list of elements in preOrder traversal
        preMin - the min index to consider in preOrder traversal
        preMax - the max index to consider in the preOrder traversal
        postOrder - the list of elements in the postOrder traversal
        postMin - the min index to consider in the postOrder traversal
        postMax - the max index to consider in the postOrder traversal
        Returns:
        a reference to the root node of the tree

      • parseFile

        public ArrayList<TreeNode> parseFile(java.lang.String path,
                            boolean ahnentafel)
        Parses the file and returns a ArrayList of People
        Parameters:
        path - the file path
        ahnentafel - true if it is an ahnentafel file, false if it is a pre/postorder file
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of people, or null if an error was encountered

      • getRelationship

        public java.lang.String getRelationship(java.lang.String nameA,
                               java.lang.String nameB)
        Returns a description of the relationship between two individuals in the tree, formatted as: [nameA] is [nameB]'s [relationship]
        Parameters:
        nameA - the first person to find in the tree
        nameB - the second person to find in the tree
        Returns:
        a description of how the two people are related

      • getRelationship

        public java.lang.String getRelationship(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a description of the relationship between two individuals in the tree, formatted as: [name] is [root]'s [relationship]
        Parameters:
        name - the person to find in the tree
        Returns:
        a description of how the person is related to the person at the root of the tree
